articles.description: Jet Airways is facing insolvency proceedings in the Netherlands in response to a complaint, where it was declared bankrupt in response to a complaint by two European creditors.

articles.title: 'Stagflation' is the greatest threat to Europe’s recovery, warns ex-Italian PM Monti - CNBC
articles.description: Former Italian Prime Minister Mario Monti believes the greatest threat to Europe's economic recovery from the coronavirus pandemic is stagflation.
articles.content:

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: EU and AstraZeneca reach deal to end vaccine delivery dispute - 9News
articles.description: The European Union and drugmaker AstraZeneca said Friday that they reached a deal to end a damaging legal battle over the slow pace of deliveries of the company's COVID-19 vaccines.
